Apache Ant (Automation)
Apache Ant is a cross platform build automation engine. The build is controlled by a build.xml file. This app includes a sample build.xml.txt file that has several comments to get you started.
>> Sample BUILD.XML
To build the project, complete the template file and type the following on the command line:
ant clean build will clean out the app directory and build the app.

Other command line parameters can be passed as well:
ant clean package will do the same thing as above, but will also create a compressed file of the app that can be uploaded to apps.splunk.com.
You can create your own parameters as well. For instance:
ant clean build test will copy over some files for testing purposes.
